privacyNotice:
This website connects to the following domains:
  • Cloudflare and JSDelivr: getting useful libraries that permit this website to work;
  • Google Fonts: downloading fonts that make this website decent-looking
  • GitHub Pages: hosting of this website
  • YouTube: only if you enable YouTube videos as a background from Settings.
Your PDFs are elaborated on your device and always stay there, and no data is sent to a server. This website saves settings in the browser's isolated LocalStorage. This storage is unique for each website and only that specific website can access it. If you want, you can delete it from your browser's settings.
icons: The file upload icon is provided by FlatIcon. All the other icons are provided by Microsoft's Fluent UI System Icons
